raw_json.html_title: Our new R package: R2jags | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
Our new R package: R2jags

Posted on February 8, 2009 by Yu-Sung Su in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on Yu-Sung Su's Blog, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

I have got emails occasionally from JAGS users, asking about our new R package: R2jags. Basically, R2jags runs JAGS via R and makes postanalysis easier to be done in R. Taking advantage of the functions provided by JAGS, rjags and R2WinBUGS, R2jags allows users to run BUGS in the same way as they would do it in R2WinBUGS. Nonetheless, R2jags has some powerful features that

Related

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: Yu-Sung Su's Blog.
R-bloggers.com offers daily e-mail updates about R news and tutorials about learning R and many other topics. Click here if you're looking to post or find an R/data-science job.
